entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #1582：妻子
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #1582 - Explosm.net

what's wrong with you?
你发什么神经？

you ruined my family reunion!
you spiked the lemonade and threw up on my mom!
你破坏了我的家庭聚会！ 你在柠檬水里掺了烈性酒，还吐了我妈妈一身！

what were you thinking?
你在想什么？

hmmm...
唔唔唔。。。

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3119：小家伙
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3119 - Explosm.net

hey, no matter what.... don't forget us little guys, alright?
嘿，无论怎样。。。 不要忘了我们的小家伙，懂吗？

what are you talking about? i'm not becoming famous.
你在说什么？ 我还没那么出名。

no, but you're getting pretty fat.
是的，但是你已经变得很胖了。

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3118：观众
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3118 - Explosm.net

for my next act, i'll need a volunteer from the audience!
为了进行下一个表演， 我需要一名来自观众席的志愿者！

step right up!
快来吧！

anyone?
有人吗？

fine!
好吧！

thanks for nothing!
不劳大家费心了！

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #1466：雪天使
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #1466 - Explosm.net

hey dad!
嘿，爹地！

i made a snow angel!
我做了个雪天使！

great job, son!
做的好，儿子！

i'll make the halo!
我来加个光环！

P.S. 雪天使，双手双脚在雪地里上下滑动即可：

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3982：跟女孩子说话
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3982 - Explosm.net

i think i'm bad at talking to girls...
我觉得我不擅长跟女孩子说话。。。

try asking them stuff instead of talking about yourself. girls like that.
可以试试问她们一些问题而不只是 谈论你自己。女孩子喜欢这个。

yeah...i'll try that.
嗯。。我会试试的。

hi i'm john. what are your five favorite things about me?
嗨，我是约翰。关于我你最喜欢哪五件事情？

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3985：戳
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3985 - Explosm.net

excuse me, is there anything i can do to help you?
打扰一下，有什么需要帮忙的吗？

huh?
啊？

are you even blind?
你是盲人吗？

bilnd? what?
盲人？什么？

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3806：吃了它
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3806 - Explosm.net

son, what have i told you about playing with your food?
儿子，关于玩弄食物我是怎么说的来着？

huh? but i didn-
啊？但是我没—

eeeeaaat it...
吃吃吃吃了它。。。

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3967：扫脚
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3967 - Explosm.net

hey... what's got you down?
嘿。。。什么事情让你这么低落？

i keep waiting for a good man to sweep me off my feet, but nothing happends!
我一直在等待一个能让我坠入爱河的好男人， 但是什么也没发生！

that's because sweeping is a woman's job.
那是因为打扫是女人干的活。

译注： sweep me off my feet: 让我坠入爱河 sweep: 打扫

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3969：上学日
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3969 - Explosm.net

okay son, are you ready for your first day of school? let's check.
好了，儿子，你为第一天去学校 做好准备了吗？让我们来检查一下。

notebook? check. pencils in pencil case? check
笔记本？OK。铅笔在铅笔盒里？OK

sick note? check
病假单？OK

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3971：看到一只蝴蝶
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3971 - Explosm.net

i see... a butterfly!
我看到。。。一只蝴蝶！

hmm... a man in a boat?
唔。。。一个人在一艘船上？

that looks like a skull!
那个看起来像一个脑袋!

you don't know what an ultrasound is, do you?
你难道不知道超声波成像是什么吗？

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3976：我听到了
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3976 - Explosm.net

hello there, young man!
小伙子，你好！

pleased to meet you
很高兴遇到你

why does he talk so quietly?
为什么他说话这么小声？

i've been wispering to him his entire life so he thinks it's normal volume for a person
这么多年来我一直小声的跟他说话， 因此他认为这就是人类正常的音量

i heard that
我听到了

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #2386：许愿
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #2386 - Explosm.net

okay son, now blow out your candles and make a wish, but don't tell anyone what it is. if you're lucky, it might come true!
好了，儿子。 现在吹灭你的蜡烛并许个愿， 但是不要告诉任何人你许了什么愿望。 如果你够幸运的话，愿望可能会成真！

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #2383：愿望
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #2383 - Explosm.net

hey son... you have a vistor
嘿，儿子。。。有人来看你了

hey there, champ... I have some good news for you!
嘿，这里，冠军。。。 我有个好消息要告诉你！

I represent the make-a-wish foundation and we're going to grant any wish you want!
我是许愿基金会的代表， 我们将实现你的任何愿望！

I wish I didn't hurt anymore
我希望我不再痛苦

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #2117：长矛
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #2117 - Explosm.net

hey man, want some gum? it's spearmint.
嘿，哥们，要来点口香糖吗？ 它是荷兰薄荷味(spearmint)的。

sure!
当然！

hey wait, this just tastes like regular mint.
嘿，等一下，这个尝起来跟普通的薄荷 没啥区别。

spear: 长矛，标枪 mint: 薄荷 spearmint: 荷兰薄荷

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #1379：法国
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #1379 - Explosm.net

listen here, frenchie! you're in the U.S. now!
听着，法国佬！你现在在美国！

here we don't have french fries or french bread!
这里没有法国薯条，也没有法国面包！

we have freedom fries and freedom bread!
我们有自由薯条和自由面包！

have you ever freedom kissed?
你试过自由吻吗？

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3970：合法
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3970 - Explosm.net

oh, cool! the fully legalized marriage.
哦，太棒了！结婚完全合法了。

don't you mean gay marriage?
你是指同性结婚吧？

is there a difference now?
现在还有什么区别吗？

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #927：室友
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #927 - Explosm.net

i heard jeremy is living with you til he finds a place.
我听说杰里米在找到住的地方前 一直跟你住在一块。

yeah. he sleeps on the couch.
是啊。他睡在沙发上。

you don't let him sleep in bed with you?
你没让他跟你一起睡在床上？

nah, my bed's way too small for two people.
没有，我的床太小没办法 同时睡两个人。

also I'm not gay!
而且，我又不是 gay！

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3112：耶稣第二次归来
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3112 - Explosm.net

jesus! you finally returned!
耶稣！你终于回归了！

just in time, too. there are gays trying to get married over there!
来的正好。 那里有两个基佬想结婚！

nice one, jesus! i'm glad you're here to-
太棒了，耶稣！ 很高兴你能——

three donw, seven billon to go.
解决了三个，还有 70 亿要解决。

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3238：你得帮我把毒吸出来
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3238 - Explosm.net

hey, check out this cool snake!
嘿，快看这条酷酷的蛇！

oh no! you're gonna have to suck the poison out!
哦，不！你得帮我把毒吸出来！

slurp
啧啧

gulp
咕噜

did you swallow the poison?
你把毒咽下去了？

oh no! you're gonna have to suck the poison out!
哦，不！你得帮我把毒吸出来！

slurp
啧啧

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3322：最棒的身材
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3322 - Explosm.net

i'm in the best shape of my life!
我正处于一生中身材最棒的时候！

you've been working out?
你之前一直在健身吧？

i'm planning to get really fat.
我计划开始增肥。

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3964：准备好了
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3964 - Explosm.net

love is in the air!
空气中弥漫着爱的气息！

i've prepared for this!
我已经早有准备！

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3174：最棒的 party
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3174 - Explosm.net

i'm gonna throw the best party ever for all my friends!
我要去为我所有的朋友们举办一场 最棒的 party！

wait. i don't have any party hats.
等一下，我还没有 party 帽。

or friends. 也没有朋友。

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3080：许愿井4
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3080 - Explosm.net

say, wishing well. what do you wish for?
说吧，许愿井。 你的愿望是什么？

small children getting trapped in me.
希望有小孩掉进来。

it's the only time people pay attention to me....
只有在这种情况下， 人们才会注意到我。。。

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3077：许愿井2
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3077 - Explosm.net

i wish this well had water so that my family can live.
我希望这口井里有水， 这样我的家人就能活下来。

clink 叮当

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3078：许愿井3
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3078 - Explosm.net

oh hey, a wishing well.
哦，一口许愿井。

i wish i wasn't so broke.
我希望我不再这么落魄。

shit like this is why you're so fucking broke
该死的，这就是你为什么这么落魄的原因

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3079：许愿
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3079 - Explosm.net

woah!
哇！

shazam!
沙赞！

blow out these candles.
吹灭这些蜡烛。

i wish i was a millionaire!
我希望我是个百万富翁！

who said anything about wishes?
谁说让你许愿了？

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3081：许愿井
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3081 - Explosm.net

i wish i'd actually asked sarah out so many years ago.
我希望在很多年前就把 萨拉约出来。

wish granted!!
愿望被接受！！

timewarp!!
时空穿梭！！

hey sarah, sarah, it's me!
嘿，萨拉，萨拉，是我啊！

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3143：钱
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3143 - Explosm.net

can i borrow some cash?
能借我点钱吗？

what for?
干嘛用？

i want to buy a motorycle!
我想买辆摩托车！

a motorcycle? do you think i'm made of money?
摩托车？你以为我是钱做的吗？

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3093：杜尚
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3093 - Explosm.net

关于这个漫画可以搜索 “杜尚 小便池”

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3122：箭
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3122 - Explosm.net

alright, now i'm gonna shoot the apple off your head with blindfolded.
好了，现在我将蒙着脸将 苹果从你的头上射下来。

did i hit it?
我射中了吗？

pretty close.
差一点。

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #1298：跳棋
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #1298 - Explosm.net

*scoot*

dude, what the hell?!
哥们，你发什么神经？

my bad, i thought we were playing street checkers.
我的错，我还以为我们在玩街头跳棋。

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3743：耶稣
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3743 - Explosm.net

check it out! it's jesus!
快看！是耶稣！

you're so dumb, jeses! get out of here, stupid!
你可真笨，耶稣！ 滚开，蠢蛋！

oh yeah? well you... um... 是吗？你。。。呃。。。

what's wrong? too stupid to think of a comeback?
怎么了？蠢到想不起来了？

hahaha!
哈哈哈!

3 dys later
三天后

your mam is stupid!
你妈妈是个蠢蛋！

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #2190：打猎
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #2190 - Explosm.net

i forgot it was hunting season already
我都忘了已经到打猎的季节了

it's not. it's swim suit season
不是的。是到泳装季节了

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #838：果汁
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #838 - Explosm.net

this juice sort of tastes like bloob
这个果汁尝起来有点像血

entry.title: Cyanide & Happiness #3949：妈妈
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3949 - Explosm.net

mom? are you there?
妈妈？你在这里吗？

yes mom... okay mom... i'll make sure i do that mom...
是的妈妈。。。 好的妈妈。。。 我保证会去做的妈妈。。。

okay mom i have to go now bye!!
好的妈妈我现在必须要走了再见！！

now i remember why i killed her
我现在想起来为什么要杀她了

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #1372：为什么他们总是跌倒
[译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #1378：跑步
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #1378 - Explosm.net

race you to that tree over there! 我们比比谁先跑到那棵树那里！

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #3105：外面
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3105 - Explosm.net

it's such a beautiful day! nobody ever grows up wishing they could spend more time inside!
多么美好的一天啊！ 没人希望长大后花更多的时间呆在家里！

but then...
另一方面...

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #3935：google 医生
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3935 - Explosm.net

what's wrong with me, google doc?
我出什么毛病了，谷歌医生？

well, we got your result back.
嗯，我们已经拿到你的结果了。

there's 18,300,000 of them.
共有 18,300,000 条。

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #2299：表情
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #2299 - Explosm.net

c'mon baby. let's head back to my place.
快过来，宝贝。 让我们回到我的位置去。

forget it. you're a jerk and i am not sleeping with you.
没门。你这个混蛋，我不会跟你睡觉的。

what if pull this face?
如果我露出这个表情呢？

hey guys, i-
嘿，伙计，我——

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #3207：笑话
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3207 - Explosm.net

what're you planting?
你在种什么？

the seed of doubt 怀疑的种子

that's the worst joke i've ever heard!
这是我听过的最糟糕的笑话！

or is it the best?
也许是最好的笑话？

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #3103：丑
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3103 - Explosm.net

your face is ugly!
你的脸好丑！

your face is uglier!
你的脸更丑！

oh yeah?
哦，是吗？

yeah!
是的！

mom?
妈咪？

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #3943：害怕
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3943 - Explosm.net

what is your biggest fear?
你最害怕什么？

hmm... i don't know. how about you?
唔... 我不知道。 你怎样？

sure, i can be yours if you want me to.
当然可以， 我可以成为你最害怕的事物， 如果你想让我这么做的话。

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #2325：五
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #2325 - Explosm.net

mr. and mrs. jefferson, we ran some tests and there's something you need to know.
杰斐逊先生和太太， 我们做了一些测验，有些事情 你们需要知道。

it appears as if your son has a rare genetic disorder. he probably won't live past five.
看起来似乎你们的儿子得了一种罕见的遗传疾病。 他可能活不过五。

he'll only live to be five years old!? oh no!!
他只能再活五年？哦，不！！

no, no, no. he won't live past five o'clock.
不，不，不。他活不到五点钟。

but... it's already 5:15.
可是。。。现在已经五点十五分了。

poke

hmm, guesss you're right.
唔，我想你是对的。

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #1476：大力水手
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #1476 - Explosm.net

hey!! that guy stole my wallet!!
嘿！！那个家伙偷了我的钱包！！

don't worry, i'll eats me spinach!
别担心，我将吃点吃菠菜！

aren't you gonna get him!?
你不去追他！？

i don't believes in violence
我不崇信暴力

fucking vegetarians!
该死的素食主义者！

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #1342：没有你我没法活
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #1342 - Explosm.net

baby, i've been doing a lot of thinking, and i just realized i can't survive without you.
宝贝，经过深思熟虑后，我已经 意识到没有你我就没法活下去。

is it because you love me?
是因为你爱我吗？

it's because you're an organ donor.
因为你是个器官捐赠者。

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #3938：我会救他
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3938 - Explosm.net

help, my son is trapped in there!
救命，我的儿子被困在里面了！

i'll save him! what's his favourite band?
我会救他的！他最喜欢的乐队是哪个？

uh, insane clown posse?
呃， Insane Clown Posse 乐队？

what are you doing?!
你在做什么？！

i'm saving him
我正在救他

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #3872：一团糟
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3872 - Explosm.net

that's it!
够了！

this economy is in shambles, and i'm going to take a stand!
经济真是一团糟，我要去表明立场！

lemonade
柠檬水

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #2082：尸体
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #2082 - Explosm.net

wanna see a dead body?
想看一具尸体吗？

sure!
想啊！

wait, isn't that your girlfriend?
等一下，那不是你的女朋友吗？

wanna see some dead bodies?
想看一些尸体吗？

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #2175：进去
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #2175 - Explosm.net

son, it's time to come inside
儿子，是时候进去了

why don't you come inside yourself!?
为什么你不自己进去！？

if only i could, we wouldn't be having this conversation
要是我能进去的话， 我们就不会有这次谈话了

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #3384：眼睛
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3384 - Explosm.net

have you met my kid?
你见过我的孩子吗？

he has my eyes！
他有我的眼睛！

i need them back
我要把它们要回来

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #3923：飞蛾
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3923 - Explosm.net

why are moths so mindlessly attracted to something that kills them?
为什么飞蛾总是盲目的被 会杀死它们的事物所吸引？
为什么飞蛾总是盲目的扑向那些会杀死它们的事物？

they are so dumb.
它们实在是太笨了。

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #3928：泰迪熊
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3928 - Explosm.net

everyone's free, is there anything else in there, ma'am?
所有人都得救了，女士，还有其他 东西在里面吗？

i just want my teddy bear, i've had him for 30 years
我只想要我的泰迪熊， 它陪伴我有30年了

i didn't know you had a teedy bear
我怎么不知道你有一个泰迪熊

i lost it years ago, i hope he finds it
我在很多年前把它给弄丢了， 我希望他能帮我找到它

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #3915：出卖
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3915 - Explosm.net

judas! you double crossed me!
犹大！你出卖了我！

actually, that's this guy's job.

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #1244
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #1244 - Explosm.net

hey this is ricky. leave a message. BEEEEP
嘿，我是里基。请留言。嘟嘟嘟

hey rick... it's me. it's your father. you there?
嘿，里基。。。是我。你爸爸。你在那里吗？

we haven't talked in a long time. i just wanted to say i'm sorry for all the wasted years.
我们有一段时间没说话了。我只想告诉你对于之前浪费的那些年我感到非常的抱歉。

i... i just got back from the doctor and... i don't have much time left. please answer.
我。。。我刚从医生那里回来。。。我没多少时间可活了。请回应。

i don't... i don't expect you to forgive me. i just want to hear your voice. please...
我不。。。我不奢望你能原谅我。我只是想听到你的声音。请。。。

i guess you're not there. please call me back. i love you, son. please call me.
我猜你应该不在那里。请给我回电话。我爱你，儿子。请给我打电话。

click 咔哒

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #3864
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #3864 - Explosm.net

you're not well, sir, you should stay with us at the hospital for a little while.
你有点不大好，先生， 你需要在医院跟我们多呆一段时间。

you're wrong, DOC! i'm not sick! i know i'm not sick! ...what is that needle for?
你搞错了，医生！ 我没病！我知道我没病！。。。 那个针是干吗用的？

it calms the nerves and helps with anxiety.
它用于安神和缓解焦虑。

you're not giving me that! get it away from me!
你不能给我打那个！让它远离我！

it's not for you.
它不是给你的。

you stress me out, man.
你让我承受了很大的压力，先生。

entry.title: [译][漫]Cyanide & Happiness #2332
entry.summary:
译自：Cyanide & Happiness #2332 - Explosm.net

nothing's more difficult than giving the eulogy at your best friend's funeral.
世界上最难的事情莫过于在你最好的朋友的葬礼上致悼词。

i dunno. pooping out of a moving car is pretty difficult.
我不知道。在一辆正在移动的汽车上向外便便是非常困难的。

that's how he died.
那就是他去世的原因。

your friend was a hero.

the glass is half full!

excuse me?

请问这些怎么卖？

Hmm...

will you marry me?

no! why do you always propose at the most unromantic times? do you think it's funny?
